newsitem.title: UGANDA: Uganda shilling weakens vs dollar, pound.
newsitem.headline: Uganda shilling weakens vs dollar, pound.

text.p: The Ugandan shilling weakened marginally against the dollar on a slight increase in demand, foreign exchange dealers said on Tuesday.
They posted the shilling at a mean rate of 1075 against the dollar compared to 1070 on Monday, while against the pound the shilling was posted at 1750 from 1730 on Monday.
